Thanks @bmccann . Yes, it seems that DataParallel has an implicit expectation that a module only holds parameters as module attributes.

This can easily be fixed by constructing all_weights on the fly in forward. @bmccann are you working on this? Otherwise I can make a PR for it.

P.S. Are you adding data parallel support to OpenNMT? That would be great.

body:
Thanks @bmccann . Yes, it seems that DataParallel has an implicit expectation that a module only holds parameters as module attributes.

This can easily be fixed by constructing `all_weights` on the fly in `forward`. @bmccann are you working on this? Otherwise I can make a PR for it.

P.S. Are you adding data parallel support to OpenNMT? That would be great.
